entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 50
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS 10 TO 15

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 15
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
